QuestData.Title: A Little 'Pick Me Up'
QuestData.Description:
Now to mix this up.
<Marten begins to combine the components in a mug>
I'm using some rather strong grog as a base, a drop of chilli extract and a handful of hearthbloom... There!
<Marten hands you a mug>
It will taste worse than it smells, but it will bring Master Ashton to his senses. Please give this mug to him.
QuestData.LogDescription: Give the mug to Master Ashton.
QuestData.RewardText: Oh! I say!$b <Ashton shudders and coughs>$b A bit less hearthbloom next time, Marten, but that did just the trick. Well done both of you.
